extracted_information: The Codementor mentor application process involves submitting a comprehensive application. To increase chances of approval and potentially speed up the internal review, applicants are advised to make their application as complete as possible before submission. Key elements to include are connecting social accounts, detailing technical skills in expertise sections, and sharing background information. A 'Codementor Profile Checklist' is referenced for guidance. Codementor only contacts applicants whose applications have been approved; not all applications are approved.
